name: Parttrap
description:
Part Trap is driven by the idea of simplifying the selection, presentation and ordering of complex products online. We understand your business processes and how these can be optimized. Part Trap offers turn-key, proven and certified products designed specifically for your ERP system. That’s why.
PURPOSE & VISION
Part Trap develops software products for e-commerce, product data management and logistics.
We offer products with turn-key integration to the major ERP systems which dramatically reduces the implementation time and the cost.
Part Trap’s clients are local or internatio-nal companies which have identified a need to optimize online sales processes. Typical clients are manufacturers, distributors or retailers with medium to high product complexity or a multi-channel sales network.
Our vision is to offer the preferred solution for our customer segment globally.
